title: Region bounded by rational function and lines

content.question:
Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of y = x2 / x2+1, the line x = 1, and the x-axis.

(a) Find the area of R.

frqParts.text:
Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of y = x2 / x2+1, the line x = 1, and the x-axis.

(a) Find the area of R.
(b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the y-axis.

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
